gremlins.gameObjects

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • gremlins.gameObjects.Wall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, GameObject

    public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObject, Drawable
    Represents a wall game object that can be drawn and potentially destroyed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isDead 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wall(double x, double y)
      Constructs a wall with specified coordinates (for non-image walls).

      Constructs a wall with an image, position, and image loader.

      • animateDestruction

        public void animateDestruction()
        Animate the destruction of the wall if it is marked for destruction. This method updates the wall's image to simulate destruction over time.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Mark the wall for destruction. This initiates the destruction animation.

      • isDestroyed

        public boolean isDestroyed()
        Check if the wall has been completely destroyed.
        Returns:
        true if the wall is completely destroyed, false otherwise

        Calculate the next coordinates of the wall (not applicable for non-moving walls).
